text: For he had entered into the city called Persepolis, and he assayed to rob Or, temples  a temple and to hold down the city. Whereupon there was an onset of the multitudes, and Or, the people of the country turned  Antiochus and his men  turned to make defence with arms; and it came to pass that Antiochus was put to flight by the people of the country and broke up his camp with disgrace.
